# Constraints file - Exact version pins for ALL dependencies
# Generated by scripts/generate_dependency_files.py
# Use with: pip install -c constraints.txt -r requirements.txt

# This file prevents dependency conflicts by pinning all versions
# including transitive dependencies.

# To regenerate transitive dependencies:
# 1. Install all requirements in a clean venv
# 2. Run: pip freeze > constraints-full.txt
# 3. Review and merge into this file
